citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Of the 6 IACUC-approved protocols the inspector reviewed, none of the protocols included written assurance that the
activities do not unnecessarily duplicate previous experiments.
Without such assurance, animals may experience unnecessarily duplicative research activities.
Correct this by ensuring all protocols reviewed and approved by the IACUC after August 14, 2025 include written
assurance that the activities do not unnecessarily duplicate previous experiments.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(d)(1)(iii) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Of the 6 IACUC-approved protocols the inspector reviewed, none of the protocols included written assurance that the 
activities do not unnecessarily duplicate previous experiments.  
 
Without such assurance, animals may experience unnecessarily duplicative research activities.  
 
Correct this by ensuring all protocols reviewed and approved by the IACUC after August 14, 2025 include written 
assurance that the activities do not unnecessarily duplicate previous experiments. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
